info.name: Fowl Play
info.attribution:

  • Cow: https://pixabay.com/vectors/cow-milk-farming-animal-eyes-farm-35561/

The library image is available as CC BY-NC 4.0. It was generated using the Midjourney artificial intelligence image generator, https://www.midjourney.com/home/, using the following prompt: "illustrated children's book style drawing of flock of chickens."
info.description: Move pieces around the board until running into another piece or the wall. Avoid moving over poop tokens. First player to reach goal area and remove all 6 pieces from the board wins.
info.helpText: Players choose color using the Players overlay on the right of the screen. Then choose seats. Game pieces start with a default color but can be linked to player colors. Pick a starting player and roll the dice. Cow = 1. Daisy = 2. If you draw a card you can keep, move it to the holder (hand) below each deck. The circle in the seat shows how many daisy cards each player has. Press the turn button to advance the turn indicator to the next player. Before moving the cow the first time, click on the fence to remove it from the board.

fields.label: Use default color? (Uncheck box to use player color).

fields.text: Are you sure you want to reset the game?

1.cardText: Eww. This one wont go away. Keep this card until you would have drawn a daisy card, then use this one instead.

2.cardText: You really shouldnt do that there. Place a poop in a space inside your goal gate.

3.cardText: Your next turn? Gone. Lost. Forget about it. You dont have one.

4.cardText: Take a chicken from the pen. Move it back to start. At least you get to choose which starting position.

5.cardText: Bye, bye daisy. Shuffle your daisy card back into its deck. Its happier there.

6.cardText: Lucky you? Your next turn is only 2 moves. Dont roll the dice and dont use the 2 to get a daisy card.

7.cardText: Before their turn starts, the next player moves one of your chickens or haystacks 1 legal move. Maybe they will be nice.

8.cardText: Was it really that good? Use the same dice result as the player before you.

9.cardText: Your chickens got tired. On your next turn, you can only move your haystacks.

10.cardText: Maybe they know better than you. Each opponent in clockwise order moves one of your chicken or haystacks 1 legal move.

11.cardText: The good news is you move 3 on your next turn. The bad news is you have to draw another poop card.

12.cardText: Do you know which end of the cow is which? Keep this card. Discard it instead of moving the cow the next time you could.

13.cardText: Did you get lost in all the poop? Next turn, do not move any of your pieces forward.

14.cardText: I hope you like the player who goes before you. Because they get to draw a daisy card. Guess who doesnt get one? You.

1.cardText: Twice as much is twice as nice. Double your roll.

2.cardText: They can fly? Fly over 1 chicken, haystack, or cow at any point in your turn as one of your moves.

3.cardText: Get the shovel ready. After your move, relocate a poop to any open saure and roll again. No poop? No problem. Still roll again.

4.cardText: You smell like a daisy. Cancel the effects of a poop. Or add 2 moves to your roll.

5.cardText: Maybe they wont notice. Shuffle this card back into the deck and steal one from anybody. Or add 2 moves to your roll.

6.cardText: Get out of my way! Move another players piece (chicken or haystack) 1 legal move any time during your turn.

7.cardText: Poop-ray vision. Take the top 3 poop cards. Order then however you want and put them back on top.

8.cardText: I dont want that poop. Shuffle the poop deck before drawing a card. Or add 2 moves to your roll.

9.cardText: Fast forward. Move a chicken from start to finish. But not your last one. That would be too easy.

10.cardText: The best gift ever. Use this card to force another player to draw a poop card.

11.cardText: Slow and steady wins the race. If you have no chickens at the finish, take one from another players pen and put it on the board.

12.cardText: Double your chances. Roll again. Choose the best one from the two rolls.

13.cardText: Lets go cow tipping. Push the cow one space in the same direction after running into it.

14.cardText: Mooove along. Move the cow as if you rolled a 1 in addition to your regular moves.
